trans-unit.source: Defines a resource in an assembly to be used from a client script file.
trans-unit.target: 在用于从客户端脚本文件的程序集中定义的资源。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The ScriptResourceAttribute class is valid only when you use it in assembly declarations.
trans-unit.target: 仅在程序集声明中使用时才能有效 ScriptResourceAttribute 类。

trans-unit.source: You use it to enable a specified embedded script resource in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 用于启用指定嵌入的脚本资源的程序集中。

trans-unit.source: You can define the name of the embedded script library, the name of the resource file for the script library, and the name that is used in a script file for retrieving the resource values.
trans-unit.target: 你可以定义嵌入的脚本库的名称、 脚本库的资源文件的名称和检索资源的值的脚本文件中使用的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> class uses the properties in ScriptResourceAttribute to determine the correct resource name for a script library.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>类使用 ScriptResourceAttribute 中的属性以确定脚本库的正确的资源名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceAttribute.TypeName%2A> property is used with a resource key to specify a resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceAttribute.TypeName%2A>属性用于与资源键指定的资源。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceAttribute.TypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ScriptResourceAttribute class can be used only to identify text-based resources for JavaScript files.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> ScriptResourceAttribute 类可以仅用于标识基于文本的 JavaScript 文件的资源。

trans-unit.source: To associate a localized image (binary) file with a particular culture, consider storing only its URL as a localized resource, which then be resolved and loaded in script.
trans-unit.target: 若要将与特定区域性关联的已本地化的图像 （二进制） 文件，请考虑存储仅其 URL 为本地化的资源，然后是已解决和中加载的脚本。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The name of the script library.
trans-unit.target: 脚本库的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceAttribute"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The ScriptResourceAttribute method is typically called by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceAttribute> attribute as an assembly attribute in the application's AssemblyInfo file.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用通常称为 ScriptResourceAttribute 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceAttribute>作为应用程序的 AssemblyInfo 文件中的程序集属性的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptResourceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The name of the script library.
trans-unit.target: 脚本库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource file for the script library.
trans-unit.target: 脚本库的资源文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the type to create for the values in the resource file.
trans-unit.target: 要创建资源文件中的值的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: scriptName, scriptResourceName, or typeName is or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: scriptNamescriptResourceName，或typeName是或空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the script library.
trans-unit.target: 获取脚本库的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the script library.
trans-unit.target: 脚本库的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the resource file for the script library.
trans-unit.target: 获取脚本库的资源文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource file for the script library.
trans-unit.target: 脚本库的资源文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the client type to create for the values in the resource file.
trans-unit.target: 获取要为资源文件中的值创建的客户端类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the client type.
trans-unit.target: 客户端类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the resource file for the script library.
trans-unit.target: 获取脚本库的资源文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource file.
trans-unit.target: 资源文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name that is used when retrieving the values in the resource file.
trans-unit.target: 获取可检索资源文件中的值时所使用的名称。

trans-unit.source: The TypeName property contains the value that is used for retrieving localized resources in client script.
trans-unit.target: 此 TypeName 属性包含用于检索客户端脚本中的本地化的资源的值。

trans-unit.source: The client script must include the TypeName value and the key name for the resource to be localized.
trans-unit.target: 客户端脚本必须包括的 TypeName 值和要进行本地化的资源的密钥名称。

trans-unit.source: The name that is used in client script when retrieving the values in the resource file.
trans-unit.target: 检索资源文件中的值时在客户端脚本中使用的名称。
